param.name: path
param.doc: Path within the template files root.

method.name: POST
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue a HTTP POST command on the Runtime Template Files resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: file
param.doc: The file to import, as binary data.

param.name: force
param.doc: Should an existing files with the same name be overwritten? If this is set to false, an error is returned if a clash is detected.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
